name: Ionific
overview:
Ionific researches and develops wireless technologies, using an expanding marketplace for wireless applications. Future mobile devices will have very sophisticated graphics support. Features seen today in high-end PCs and game consoles will appear in these devices.

Founded in 1994, Ionific has focused on the design and implementation of audio-visual systems and fault-tolerant networks. During last years, the main customers have been Nokia, Finnish Defence Forces and Bitboys. Ionific develops technology that brings desktop class applications to next generation mobile devices. As of 8/19/2004, Ionific is a subsidiary of Botnia Hightech Group.
